viewData.name: Samsung 13.3" Notebook 9 Pen Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Ocean Blue)
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung 13.3" Notebook 9 Pen Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop (Ocean Blue) featuring 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U Quad-Core, 8GB LPDDR3 | 512GB PCIe SSD 13.3" 1920 x 1080 Multi-Touch Display. Review Samsung
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" Notebook 9 Pen Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Laptop from Samsung is a thin and light system designed for the on-the-go user. It features a 13.3" 1920 x 1080 multi-touch display, driven by integrated Intel HD graphics, and has a 350-nit brightness rating with a peak of 500 for outdoor use. Moreover, it folds up to 360Â° so you can easily share what's on your screen or use it as a tablet. Included with the Laptop 9 is an S Pen, which you can use to take notes and draw. It even has its own storage compartment so you won't lose it.  Specs-wise, it's powered by a 1.8 GHz Intel Core i7-8565U quad-core processor, 8GB of LPDDR3 RAM, and a 512GB PCIe SSD. If you need more space, you can connect external storage solutions using its USB ports as well as its microSD card reader. Other integrated features include 802.11ac dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, Thunderbolt 3, a backlit keyboard, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and a fingerprint reader. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Home.
